definition: case insensitive/not distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters
pinyin: bu4 qu1 fen1 da4 xiao3 xie3

definition: case sensitive/distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: Causes the next character to be outputted, to be output in lower case.
sentences.chinese: 使下一個被輸出的字符輸出爲小寫。

sentences.english: Assignment activities used for setup begin with a lowercase letter.
sentences.chinese: 用於設置的分配活動則以小寫字母開頭。

sentences.english: The case-sensitive name of the schema.
To change a printer to print upper-case letters(and various symbols) instead of lower-case.
sentences.chinese: 印刷或打印用的一種小寫字符。

sentences.english: Keys are lowercased. Values are not modified.
sentences.chinese: 所有鍵名被轉爲小寫，而值不會被修改。

sentences.english: The lower-case version of the queue manager name is required for the certificate label.
sentences.chinese: 證書標籤需要隊列管理器名稱的小寫版本。

sentences.english: Finally — and I’ve never seen this before — the letter keys are all lowercase.
sentences.chinese: 最後，讓我喫驚的是，所有的按鍵都是小寫字母。

sentences.english: The case-sensitive name of the schema into which the objects are to be restored.
sentences.chinese: 要將對象恢復到的模式的大小寫敏感名。

sentences.english: All variables are single character, lower-case letters.
sentences.chinese: 所有變量都是單個小寫字母。
訪問元素是區分大小寫的。

sentences.english: Please quote decal adhered to table top permanently and option to adhere decal to case.
sentences.chinese: 請報至工作臺面貼花堅持永久選項堅持貼花大小寫。

sentences.english: Compare the lower-case version of the suffix with the lower-case version of the file.
sentences.chinese: 比較小寫形式的後綴和文件。

sentences.english: Fill out the next screen as follows, ensuring that you use the correct case for the names.
sentences.chinese: 如下填寫下一屏，確保名稱的大小寫正確。

sentences.english: Most variables and functions should start with a lower case letter.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的變量名和方法命應以小寫字母開頭。

sentences.english: Lowercase letters in the text are left unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 文本中的小寫字母保持不變。

definition: Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
capital letters/uppercase letters/block letters/banker's anti-fraud numerals
Min dialects, spoken in Fujian Province, Taiwan etc
to overdose on supplementary medicine/to cram too hard
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
